name: Independence Aviation
about: Independence Aviation, located at Centennial Airport in Denver, Colorado, is a premier flight training school and a Platinum Cirrus Training Center. Established in 2007, the school is renowned for its exceptional service and highly trained instructors, including the FAAâ€™s 2017 Flight Instructor of the Year. Independence Aviation offers a comprehensive range of training programs, from Private Pilot to Commercial and Airline Transport Pilot certifications, as well as specialized courses such as Mountain Flight Training and Cirrus Transition Training. With a fleet of new and well-maintained Cirrus aircraft, the school provides an immersive and supportive learning environment, ensuring students achieve their aviation goals with confidence and proficiency. Independence Aviation is committed to excellence in flight training, making it the best choice for aspiring pilots in Colorado.
